content.name: Emir Gökhan ÖZÇELİK
content.personal: 34 years old, Turkish, currently living in Toulouse, France, relocation possible to anywhere in the World
content.mission: Passionate about application design and development in all of its layers, I am looking for new career opportunities with a larger space to evolve and make a change for the better. I thrive with learning and problem-solving challenges in everyday life and aim to always be better than yesterday.
